txt.en: 'Orcs are everywhere around this farmland. It looks as if they're building machines for war! I worry what will happen if they march to Minas Tirith with these machines. We must stop them from building any more of this siege equipment!'
'That was difficult but we sure made quick work of that camp! I don't think they'll be able to construct any more siege machines now!'
You and Tolwin encounter a group of Orcs building machines of war. These Orcs should be stopped at once.
Parth Gladló is located in southern Talath Anor.\n\nYou should defeat Mordor siege-builders and destroy lumber piles at Parth Gladló.
